description.english: Successfully finish 10 missions with three other players
description.german: Schließe 10 Missionen erfolgreich mit drei anderen Spielern ab.
description.french: Terminez 10 missions avec trois autres joueurs
description.italian: Completa 10 missioni con altri tre giocatori
description.spanish: Completa 10 misiones con éxito junto con tres jugadores más.
description.schinese: 与其他三位玩家成功完成10次任务
description.russian: Выполните 10 заданий с тремя другими игроками
description.brazilian: Conclua 10 missões bem-sucedidas com outros três jogadores

description.english: Equip a weapon of High-End quality or higher
description.german: Rüste dich mit einer Waffe der Spitzenklasse-Qualität oder höher aus.
description.french: Équipez une arme de niveau Haut de gamme ou plus
description.italian: Equipaggia un'arma di qualità d'élite o superiore
description.spanish: Equipa un arma de calidad superior como mínimo.
description.schinese: 装备一件优良品质或更高级别的武器
description.russian: Возьмите оружие первоклассного или даже лучшего качества
description.brazilian: Equipe uma arma de qualidade de Alta tecnologia ou superior

description.english: Have all of a character's weapon and modifications slot be of an High-End quality or higher
description.german: Rüste alle Charaktere komplett mit Waffen und Waffenmodifikationen aus, die Spitzenklasse-Qualität oder höher besitzen.
description.french: Faites passer tous les emplacements d'armes et de modifications d'un personnage à Haut de gamme ou supérieur
description.italian: Equipaggia tutti gli slot delle armi e delle modifiche di un personaggio con oggetti di livello epico o superiore
description.spanish: Ocupa todas las ranuras de armas y de modificaciones del personaje con equipamiento de calidad épica o superior.
description.schinese: 为一个角色的所有武器和改装栏位装备上史诗或更高级别的物品
description.russian: Все ваши персонажи владеют оружием и модификациями самого высокого качества.
description.brazilian: Equipe uma personagem com armas e todos os espaços de modificação de armas com items de qualidade de Alta tecnologia ou superior

description.french: Faites passer votre plateforme au niveau 3
description.italian: Potenzia il tuo quartier generale fino al livello 3
description.spanish: Mejora la base hasta el nivel 3.
description.schinese: 将你的枢纽中心升到3级
description.brazilian: Melhore sua base para o nível 3

description.english: Use melee attacks to kill 3200 enemies
description.french: Tuez 3 200 ennemis avec des attaques au corps-à-corps
description.italian: Uccidi 3200 nemici con attacchi in mischia
description.spanish: Mata a 3200 enemigos con ataques cuerpo a cuerpo.
description.schinese: 使用近战攻击杀死3200个敌人
description.brazilian: Use ataques corpo a corpo para matar 3.200 inimigos

description.french: Envoyez des survivants sur 20 missions de survivant
description.italian: Manda sopravvissuti ad affrontare 20 missioni dei sopravvissuti
description.spanish: Envía supervivientes a 20 misiones de supervivientes.
description.schinese: 派遣幸存者执行20次幸存者任务
description.brazilian: Envie sobreviventes em 20 missões de sobrevivente

description.english: Complete 50 Story Missions in OVERKILL difficulty
description.german: Schließe 50 Story-Missionen auf der Schwierigkeitsstufe „OVERKILL“ ab.
description.italian: Completa 50 missioni della storia a difficoltà OVERKILL
description.spanish: Completa 50 misiones de la historia en dificultad OVERKILL.
description.schinese: 以枪林弹雨难度完成50次剧情任务
description.brazilian: Conclua 50 missões de história na dificuldade OVERKILL

displayName.german: Am Boden aber nicht am Ende
displayName.french: Au sol mais pas à terre

description.english: Kill 20 walkers as they're grappling you
description.german: Töte 20 Beißer, während sie dich festhalten.
description.italian: Uccidi 20 vaganti mentre subisci una presa
description.brazilian: Mate 20 errantes enquanto eles agarram você

displayName.brazilian: Pau que nasce torto se endireita

description.schinese: 解锁一个新的第二技能

displayName.english: I Can Do This All Day
displayName.italian: Posso andare avanti tutto il giorno

description.italian: Usa un'abilità specifica di un personaggio 50 volte

description.english: Construct 25 Fortifications while defending your Camp
description.german: Errichte 25 Befestigungen, während du deine Basis verteidigst.
description.french: Construisez 25 défenses en défendant le campement
description.spanish: Construye 25 defensas mientras defiendes tu campamento.
description.schinese: 防守营地时建造25个防御工事
description.russian: Сделайте 25 защитных сооружений во время защиты лагеря
description.brazilian: Construa 25 Defesas enquanto defende o acampamento

description.french: Défendez 10 fois votre campement avec succès
description.italian: Difendi con successo il tuo accampamento per 10 volte
description.spanish: Defiende tu campamento con éxito 10 veces.
description.brazilian: Realize 10 defesas bem-sucedidas no seu acampamento

displayName.english: Can't Keep My Eyes Off of You
displayName.french: Je ne vous quitte pas des yeux
displayName.italian: Non riesco a toglierti gli occhi di dosso

description.english: Kill 400 humans while aiming down sight
description.german: Töte 400 Menschen, während du sie mit einer Zielvorrichtung anvisierst.
description.french: Tuez 400 humains avec la lunette de visée
description.italian: Uccidi 400 umani mirando con il mirino
description.spanish: Mata a 400 humanos apuntando con la mira.

description.english: Successfully complete at least one mission with each class
description.german: Schließe mit jeder Klasse mindestens eine Mission erfolgreich ab.
description.french: Terminez au moins une mission avec chaque classe
description.italian: Completa con successo almeno una missione con ciascuna classe
description.spanish: Completa con éxito al menos una misión con cada clase de personaje.
description.schinese: 用每种职业成功完成至少一次任务
description.russian: Выполните хотя бы одно задание каждым классом
description.brazilian: Conclua pelo menos uma missão em cada classe

description.english: Have 20 Survivors living in your camp
description.spanish: Ten a 20 supervivientes viviendo en tu campamento.
description.schinese: 在你的营地里安置20个幸存者

description.english: Maintain positive morale in your Camp for 10 Upkeeps
description.german: Halte 10 Unterhaltsphasen lang eine positive Moral in deiner Basis.
description.french: Maintenez un moral positif dans votre camp durant 10 tours d’entretien
description.italian: Mantieni il morale dell'accampamento a un livello positivo per 10 giorni di mantenimento
description.spanish: Mantén un estado de ánimo positivo en tu campamento durante 10 mantenimientos.
description.schinese: 保持营地士气高涨长达10次的保养费
description.russian: Поддерживайте положительный настрой в лагере 10 расходных периодов
description.brazilian: Mantenha o moral positivo no acampamento por 10 ciclos de manutenção

displayName.spanish: El azote de los muertos vivientes

description.english: Kill 250 walkers in a row without being downed
description.german: Töte 250 Beißer hintereinander, ohne niedergestreckt zu werden.
description.french: Tuez 250 rôdeurs à la suite sans tomber à terre
description.italian: Uccidi 250 vaganti di seguito senza finire a terra
description.spanish: Mata a 250 caminantes seguidos sin que te abatan.
description.schinese: 在不倒地的情况下连续杀死250个丧尸
description.russian: Убейте 250 ходячих подряд, ни разу не упав

description.english: Kill 30 humans in a row without being downed
description.german: Töte 30 Menschen hintereinander, ohne niedergesteckt zu werden.
description.french: Tuez 30 humains à la suite sans tomber à terre
description.italian: Uccidi 30 umani di seguito senza finire a terra
description.spanish: Mata a 30 humanos seguidos sin que te abatan.
description.schinese: 在不倒地的情况下连续杀死30个人类
description.russian: Убейте 30 человек, ни разу не упав

description.english: Carry 10 weapon drops to the extraction zone
Complete a Story Mission without being downed
description.german: Schließe eine Story-Mission ab, ohne niedergestreckt zu werden.
description.french: Terminez une mission Histoire sans tomber à terre
description.italian: Completa una missione della storia senza finire a terra
description.spanish: Completa una misión de la historia sin que te abatan.
description.schinese: 在不被击中的情况下完成一次剧情任务
description.russian: Выполните сюжетное задание, ни разу не упав
description.brazilian: Conclua uma missão de história sem cair

description.english: Use 40 Tools to complete your missions throughout the game
description.german: Benutze beim Abschließen von Missionen im Verlauf des gesamten Spiels 40 Werkzeuge.
description.french: Utilisez 40 outils pour terminer vos missions
description.italian: Usa 40 attrezzi per completare le missioni durante il gioco
description.spanish: Usa 40 herramientas para completar tus misiones durante todo el juego.
description.schinese: 在游戏中使用40个工具完成你的任务
description.brazilian: Use 40 ferramentas para concluir suas missões ao longo do jogo

description.english: Complete 8 missions with the noise level maxed out
description.german: Schließe 8 Missionen mit maximalem Lärmpegel ab.
description.french: Terminez 8 missions avec le niveau de son au maximum
description.italian: Completa 8 missioni con il livello del rumore al massimo
description.spanish: Completa 8 misiones con el nivel de ruido al máximo.
description.schinese: 在噪音等级最大的情况下，完成8次任务
description.russian: Выполните 8 заданий с максимальным уровнем шума
description.brazilian: Conclua 8 missões com nível máximo de ruído

displayName.english: Pick on Someone Your Own Size
displayName.italian: Prenditela con uno della tua taglia
displayName.brazilian: Mexa com alguém do seu tamanho

description.spanish: Mata a 30 humanos pesados y brutos.
description.schinese: 杀死30个人类重卫和暴徒
description.russian: Убейте 30 здоровяков и громил из числа людей

description.german: Behebe 15-mal eine Ladehemmung bei einer beliebigen Waffe.
description.italian: Sblocca 15 volte un'arma di qualsiasi tipo

displayName.spanish: Con las manos en la masa

description.english: Lend a helping hand from Lincoln
Bring Heather's backpack home from the Lincoln Memorial
description.german: Bring Heather's Rucksack vom Lincoln Memorial nach Hause.
description.french: Ramenez le sac d'Heather depuis le Mémorial de Lincoln
description.italian: Riporta Heather a casa dal Lincoln Memorial
description.spanish: Trae a Heather de vuelta a casa desde el Monumento a Lincoln.
description.schinese: 将Heather的背包从林肯纪念堂带回来
description.russian: Приведите Хэзер домой из Мемориала Линкольна
description.brazilian: Leve a mochila da Heather de volta do Lincoln Memorial

description.english: Collect all lore items in No Sanctuary
description.french: Collectez tous les objets perdus dans "Aucun Sanctuaire"
description.italian: Raccogli tutti gli oggetti smarriti in "Nessun Santuario"
description.spanish: Colecciona todos los objetos perdidos de «Sin Santuario»
description.schinese: 收集所有无处所避的故事相关道具
description.brazilian: Colete todos os itens de conhecimento em "Sem Santuário"

description.english: Rescue 10 survivors (except the deserter) in No Sanctuary
description.german: Rette 10 Überlebende (außer dem Deserteur) in „Keine Zuflucht“
description.french: Sauvez 10 Survivants (à l'exception du Déserteur) dans "Aucun Sanctuaire"
description.italian: Salva 10 sopravvissuti (tranne il Disertore) in "Nessun Santuario"
description.spanish: Rescata a 10 supervivientes (sin contar al desertor) en «Sin Santuario»
description.schinese: 解救十个生还者（不包括逃跑者）在无处所避
description.brazilian: Resgate 10 sobreviventes (fora o Desertor) em "Sem Santuário"

description.german: Birg bei einem Spieldurchgang von „Accord Oil: Raubzug“ 8 Benzinkanister.

description.spanish: Extrae 8 latas de combustible en una sola partida de «Accord Oil: caza de suministros».

description.french: Extrayez 50 jerrycans de carburant dans « Accord Oil : Ravitaillement »
description.spanish: Extrae 50 latas de combustible en «Accord Oil: caza de suministros».
description.schinese: 在“亚格燃油：物资搜索”任务中总共取得50罐燃料

displayName.french: Vous êtes ce que vous mangez
displayName.brazilian: Você é o Que Você Come

description.italian: Completa Il nemico del mio nemico

description.french: Récupérez les 5 accessoires d'Andy la pomme
description.italian: Raccogli tutti e 5 gli accessori di Apple Andy
description.spanish: Consigue los 5 accesorios de Andy Manzana.
description.brazilian: Colete todos os 5 acessórios de Andy Maçã

description.italian: Recupera 5 casse di armi in Appletown Organic: Ricerca di scorte
